name: Spidops
flavorText: It clings to branches and ceilings using its threads and moves without a sound. It takes out its prey before the prey even notices it.

previous.name: Tarountula
previous.flavorText: The ball of threads wrapped around its body is elastic enough to deflect the scythes of Scyther, this Pokémon’s natural enemy.

next.name: Nymble
next.flavorText: It has its third set of legs folded up. When it’s in a tough spot, this Pokémon jumps over 30 feet using the strength of its legs.
